title: Influence of intrinsic spin ordering in La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3−δ and Ba0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3−δ towards electrocatalysis of oxygen redox reaction in solid oxide cell
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30590-30605
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05191B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shoroshi Dey, Rajasekar Saravanan, Suprita Hati, Soumyabrata Goswami, Athira Suresh, Deepshikha Jaiswal-Nagar, Moupiya Ghosh, Satadal Paul, Abir Bhattacharya, Madhumita Mukhopadhyay, Jayanta Mukhopadhyay
Spin ordering in (La/Ba)0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3−δ with substitution at A-site enables them to be excellent electrocatalyst for OER and ORR in reversible SOC wherein catalysis & spin ordering originate from spin exchange interaction.
